summary: The diff partially implements the frontend-only static bootstrap (new main.static.tsx and index.html update) and adds an SPA redirect file plus converts the Contact form to a local-only submission flow. However, it does not remove/separate the Internet Computer backend from the build/deploy flow (backend changes were made and a new Motoko file was added), does not add Netlify build configuration (netlify.toml), and appears to introduce multiple UI/content changes that conflict with the “UI unchanged” requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Convert the project into a frontend-only, fully static React/Vite site suitable for Netlify deployment by removing the Internet Computer backend canister code and IC-specific build/deploy configuration from the repo.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff still contains and modifies backend Motoko canister code, and even adds a new backend migration file, which contradicts removing/separating the backend from the build/deploy flow. No evidence is shown that dfx/IC deploy configuration was removed or separated for Netlify-only builds.
